root.name: Devil's Tuning Fork
root.description: Overview Use sound to see. In The Devil's Tuning Fork, a mysterious epidemic spreads among the children of the world and pulls them into comas. One of these comatose children (you) awakens in an alternate reality devoid of any light. Nearby, however, floats the Devil's Tuning Fork, a magical instrument which allows the wielder to visually perceive the world through sound. Using the fork to navigate the environment and its puzzles, the child must rescue the other victims and escape.System Requirements Operating System: Microsoft XPProcessor: Dual Core 2 GHz or Single core 3 GHzMemory: 512 MBHard Drive Space: 1 GBVideo: GeForce 7600 (Nvidia) or Radeon 3650 (ATI)DirectX: DirectX 9.0cOpen GL: Open GL 2.0
